transportAdvice: Monaco is extremely compact and walkable, though its hilly terrain and many staircases can make some routes tiring; elevators and escalators are provided at key points throughout the principality. A public bus network covers the main areas and connects to neighboring French towns, and taxis are readily available throughout the city-state.
